source.query:
SELECT table_name  FROM information_schema.tables
                      WHERE table_schema='public' 
                      and (table_name like 'fact%' or table_name like 'dim%')
                      and table_name  not like '%_bak_%'
                      and table_name  not like '%_daily%'
                      and table_name  not like '%_weekly%'
                      and table_name  not like '%_monthly%'
                      and table_name  not like '%_history%'
